a.detail: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor
a.summary: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor

e.detail: A stream of quicksilver cuts across the corridor

i.detail: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here
i.summary: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a treasure vault. It was eventually abandoned by its creators, and the dungeon has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
